title: Starts,Turns and Progressive Drills
brief_description: Starts and turns are an important aspect of competitive swimming. A good start and then a good turn can mean the difference between winning and losing. This video goes into great detail, using slow motion replays to show how to achieve a good start and turn. Also covered are swimming drills to help improve your swimming style.
